messages.message: Invalid rgbSliceByteLength in BasisLzEtc1sImageDesc. rgbSliceByteLength must not be 0.
messages.details: For Level 2 Layer 0 Face 0 zSlice 0 the rgbSliceByteLength is 0 but it must not be 0.

messages.message: Non-conformant texture file accepted by libktx.
messages.details: KTX 2.0 file does not conform to the specification but it is currently accepted by libktx.
